description.displayText:
To whom it may concern: 

As the manager of Vera Elysia, I would be proud to recommend Janice for the babysitting position you are looking to fill. 

Janice has been a great employee since she has joined our company in April of 2014. During this period, she has shown maturity, responsibility, and reliability. Janice is always punctual and prepared to work. In addition, Janice always takes the time to go above and beyond expectations without being asked which shows her great work ethic. 

Janice has proven to be very friendly and enthusiastic and has great communication skills with people of all ages. I can say with confidence that she would be a great addition in your child/children's lives. You can trust her to have fun with, grow with, and most importantly, be safe with your children. 

If you have any further questions or would like to request more information, please contact me.

description.displayText: I've known Janice for her entire life. She's friendly, energetic and poise. She babysat for me on numerous occasions and I can tell you now I have no complaints! I have a two year old with a lot of energy. She comes in plays with him and takes very good care of him. I would gladly recommend her to anyone! A+ service.
